name: The Rim
description:
Instructions:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Up
  • Interact/Talk - Space/X
  • Shoot - Space/X
  • Use Z Power - Z

Gameplay: Collect P-power to upgrade your weapon. Collect Z-power for a powerful area attack. Only one Z power can be held at a time (until you upgrade your ship).

Backstory: This was the first game I designed in collaboration with Aleksander Vinter. As part of my Vinter Summer event, I've made this demo available here on Itch.io.

Can also be played in your browser (no install required) - RoflGames.com/TheRim
